hanzi-su-wiki:
奴

Значения

Слуга; парень; он, она, это, то; раб

Мнемоника

Забирать 又 девушку 女 в наложницы. Позднее — раб или слуга.

奴

奴В древних обществах девушек 女 могли забирать (рука 又) в рабы.
núРаб
«Раб принуждён к изнуряющей работе.»
«Этот раб хромой на две ноги» (2-й тон).

purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 主
Ideographic: A woman 女 standing by her master's right hand 又; 女 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
奴隶 [ nú lì ]: slave
匈奴 [ xiōng nú ]: Xiongnu, a people of the Eastern Steppe who created an empire that flourished around the time of the Qin and Han dynasties
奴婢 [ nú bì ]: slave servant
奴隶主 [ nú lì zhǔ ]: slave owner
农奴 [ nóng nú ]: serf
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 又 [ yòu ] and, also, again, in addition
heisig_chinese_memo: These days there are all kinds of fetishes including men who like their crotch to be the woman's slave.
koohiiStory1: That GUY stole my WOMAN so I kicked him in the CROTCH. (This story helps keep the word "GUY" as someone you hold in contempt).
koohiiStory2: Guys only care about 2 things: women and their crotch (preferably at the same time).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The woman sitting on that stool is actually a dude. Oh oops! You thought he was a woman because of his long hair and the way he was sitting. Maybe you shouldn't be judging people based on their looks!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Dude, I can't believe you called that dude a woman. What's wrong with you?!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You only found out this dude wasn't a woman when a dog ど ran up and the dude stood up. He started rubbing the dogs face saying, "Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy? Not you! Me! I'm the best boy of them all. Because I am a dude, the best of all boys! HAHAHAHA!"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look at the poor dog. He's not a dude and now he doesn't think he's a good boy, all because of this other dude. Was he sitting on the stool this whole time, waiting to make this dog feel bad? I guess you'll never know...
Ru_trainchinese: nú: (графема) раб; порабощать; (уничижит.) рабский последователь; (устар., девушка о себе) я
Kanshudo_mnemonic: it's a woman (女) again (又) - not a guy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: These days there are all kinds of fetishes including men who like their crotch to be the woman's slave.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The oracle " slave " is like a slave whose hands are folded and countered behind his back, indicating a low status slave. After adding " again ", it represents the hand that drives the slave. The original meaning is slave and slave. Bronze writing was changed from " female ". In ancient times, slaves and maidservants mostly used women, so " female " and " female " also played a side role (Shen Pei). The difference between the word " slave " and the word "女" in the oracle bone inscriptions is: the word "女" is like a woman with her hands folded on her chest, and the word " slave " with her hands on her back (Yu Shengwu). The word " Xun " in the oracle bone inscriptions is taken from " slave " to mean interrogation of slaves and prisoners. See " news ".

"Shuowen": "Slaves, slaves, and maids are all ancient people. "Zhou Li" said: "The slave, the man enters Lili, and the woman enters the 藁." From the female to the other. 㚢, ancient prose Slave to others."

Jiajin inscriptions are used as names of people and places. Jin Wenxi sees the place name "Biao Slave", such as "Bao Slave" in the four-year Guinu Ling Ling Ge. "The Blame Slave" "Han Shu. "Geography" was written as "Gao Slave", which belonged to the Wei State during the Warring States Period, in the northeast of Yan'an City, Shaanxi Province today.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are called " Ru ", which means the same, "Guodian Slips. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 8-9: "Ye (Yu) is almost a slave (such as) Winter Shed River, You (Yu) almost not (its) Slave (such) stunned (feared) Tian neighbors." It means hesitating like crossing a river in winter , Hesitating as if afraid of neighboring countries (Liu Zhao). "Shangbo Bamboo Book IV. Multi-Pay" Jane 2: "Many people and many people, Mo Nu (like) brother [brother]." It means that among many people, there is no one who is closer than a brother (Ji Xusheng).
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The oracle " slave " is like a slave with hands folded behind him, indicating a low status slave. After adding from " again " (driving the slave's hand). The original meaning is slave and slave.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文「奴」象雙手在身後交疊、反翦，表示地位低下的奴隸。後加從「又」，代表驅使奴隸的手。本義是奴隸、奴僕。金文改為從「女」，古代奴婢多用女子，所以從「女」，「女」也起聲旁作用(沈培)。甲骨文「奴」字和「女」字的區別是：「女」字象女人雙手交疊於胸前，「奴」字奴僕雙手交疊於背後(于省吾)。甲骨文「訊」字從「奴」為意符，表示訊問奴隸、俘虜。參見「訊」。

　　《說文》：「奴，奴、婢，皆古之辠人也。《周禮》曰：『其奴，男子入于辠隸，女子入于舂藁。』从女从又。㚢，古文奴从人。」

　　甲金文用作人名、地名。金文習見「咎奴」一地名，如四年咎奴蓸令戈：「咎奴」。「咎奴」《漢書．地理志》作「高奴」，戰國時屬於魏國，在今陝西省延安市東北。

　　戰國竹簡通假為「如」，表示如同，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡8-9：「夜(豫)乎奴(如)冬涉川，猷(猶)乎丌(其)奴(如)愄(畏)田鄰。」意謂猶豫如冬天過河，躊躇如害怕周邊的鄰國(劉釗)。《上博竹書四．多薪》簡2：「多人多人，莫奴(如)兄[弟]。」意謂在多人之中，沒有比兄弟更親近的(季旭昇)。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文「奴」象雙手在身後交疊，表示地位低下的奴隸。後加從「又」（驅使奴隸的手）。本義是奴隸、奴僕。

奴(やっこ): servant, fellow

甲骨文「 奴 」象雙手在身後交疊、反翦，表示地位低下的奴隸。後加從「 又 」，代表驅使奴隸的手。本義是奴隸、奴僕。金文改為從「 女 」，古代奴婢多用女子，所以從「 女 」，「 女 」也起聲旁作用(沈培)。甲骨文「 奴 」字和「 女 」字的區別是：「 女 」字象女人雙手交疊於胸前，「 奴 」字奴僕雙手交疊於背後(于省吾)。甲骨文「 訊 」字從「 奴 」為意符，表示訊問奴隸、俘虜。參見「 訊 」。 《說文》：「奴，奴、婢，皆古之辠人也。《周禮》曰：『其奴，男子入于辠隸，女子入于舂藁。』从女从又。㚢，古文奴从人。」 甲金文用作人名、地名。金文習見「咎奴」一地名，如四年咎奴蓸令戈：「咎奴」。「咎奴」《漢書．地理志》作「高奴」，戰國時屬於魏國，在今陝西省延安市東北。 戰國竹簡通假為「 如 」，表示如同，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡8-9：「夜(豫)乎奴(如)冬涉川，猷(猶)乎丌(其)奴(如)愄(畏)田鄰。」意謂猶豫如冬天過河，躊躇如害怕周邊的鄰國(劉釗)。《上博竹書四．多薪》簡2：「多人多人，莫奴(如)兄[弟]。」意謂在多人之中，沒有比兄弟更親近的(季旭昇)。

After adding " again", it represents the hand that drives the slave. The original meaning is slave and slave. Bronze writing was changed from " female". In ancient times, slaves and maidservants mostly used women, so " female" and " female" also played a side role (Shen Pei). The difference between the word " slave" and the word " 女" in the oracle bone inscriptions is: the word " 女" is like a woman with her hands folded on her chest, and the word " slave" with her hands on her back (Yu Shengwu). The word " Xun" in the oracle bone inscriptions is taken from " slave" to mean interrogation of slaves and prisoners. See " news". "Shuowen": "Slaves, slaves, and maids are all ancient people. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 8-9: "Ye (Yu) is almost a slave (such as) Winter Shed River, You (Yu) almost not (its) Slave (such) stunned (feared) Tian neighbors." 奴字的基本解释

奴
nú
阶级社会中受压迫、剥削、役使的没有人身自由的人：农奴。奴隶。奴婢（男女奴仆）。奴颜婢膝。奴性。
像对待奴隶那样地：奴役。奴使。
使人甘受奴役地：奴化。
仆主

奴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nú］
［《廣韻》乃都切，平模，泥。］
(1)丧失人身自由，为主人从事无偿劳动的人。
(2)多指男奴。
(3)使之为奴；奴役。
(4)对人的鄙称。
(5)自称的谦词。
(6)后世为妇女自称。
(7)为吴方言中之第一人称。
(8)我国古代少数民族臣下对其主的自称。
(9)动、植物及其他杂物名所带的缀词，具有喜爱的感情色彩。如称猫为狸奴，竹夫人为竹奴、青奴，橘子为橘奴，头发为乌奴等。
(10)通“駑”。
(11)水停滞不流。

奴字的英文翻译

◎ 奴
enslave, slave

奴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　奴； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页254第26
〔古文〕㚢【廣韻】乃都切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】農都切，?音孥。【說文】奴婢，古之罪人。【周禮·秋官·司厲】男子入于罪隸，女子入于舂藳。凡有爵者，與七十者，未齔者，皆不爲奴。【前漢·衞靑傳】人奴之生，得無笞罵足矣，安望封侯乎。　又地名。雍奴，漢縣，屬漁陽郡。建武二年，封?恂爲雍奴侯。見【後漢書】。　又澤名。四面有水曰雍，不流曰奴。見【水經注】。　又姓。廬奴之後。見【統譜】。　又念奴，官妓名。【元稹·連昌宮詞】力士傳呼覓念奴。　又梵言䭾索迦，華言奴。　又飛奴，鴿也。張九齡家養羣鴿，每與親知書信，繫鴿尾上，依所敎投之。　又燭奴，燭檠也。申王以檀木刻童子執畫燭，名曰燭奴。見【天寶遺事】。　又酪奴，與茗爲奴。齊王肅品題食物，惟酪不中與茗爲奴，見【洛陽伽藍記】。　又木奴，柑橘號。【杜甫詩】方同楚客憐鄕樹，不學荆州利木奴。見【玉堂閑話】。　又竹奴，靑奴，世所稱竹夫人，所以憩臂休膝者，見【黃庭堅集】。　又錫奴，溫足缾也。荔枝奴，龍眼也。狸奴，獺也。?見【玉堂閑話

奴字的源字形

奴字的起名意思

阶级社会中，丧失自由，遭受压迫、剥削、役使的人。封建时代女子自称。

slave
Basic explanation of words
slave
nú
Those who are oppressed, exploited, and enslaved in a class society without personal freedom: serfs. slave. Slaves (servants of men and women). subservient. servility.
Like slaves: slavery. Slave.
Make people willing to be enslaved: enslavement.
Servant
slave

[①] [nú]
["Guangyun" is all cut, flat mold, clay. ]
(1) Those who have lost personal freedom and engaged in unpaid labor for their masters.
(2) Multi-fingered male slaves.
(3) Make it a slave; enslavement.
(4) A contemptuous name for people.
(5) Self-proclaimed modest words.
(6) Later generations call themselves women.
(7) It is the first person in Wu dialect.
(8) The self-proclaimed masters of the subordinates of ethnic minorities in ancient my country.
(9) The suffixes attached to the names of animals, plants and other miscellaneous things have an affectionate color of affection. For example, cats are called raccoon slaves, Mrs. Bamboo is bamboo slaves and green slaves, oranges are orange slaves, and hair is Wu slaves.
(10) Through "驽".
(11) The water is stagnant.

Большая рука схватила женщину и заставила ее обратиться в рабство.
Первоначальное значение слова «раб» - «раб» (независимо от пола).
«Хань Шу»: «Лица, которые изготавливают пружинную ткань (монеты) в частном порядке, и их жены (жены и дети) переходят в слуг и слуг». Позже стали чаще обращаться к «слугам».

nú

Radicals: 女, 又  (woman, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
The woman sitting on that stool is actually a dude. Oh oops! You thought he was a woman because of his long hair and the way he was sitting. Maybe you shouldn't be judging people based on their looks!
Dude, I can't believe you called that dude a woman. What's wrong with you?!
Reading Mnemonic
You only found out this dude wasn't a woman when a dog ど ran up and the dude stood up. He started rubbing the dogs face saying, "Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy? Not you! Me! I'm the best boy of them all. Because I am a dude, the best of all boys! HAHAHAHA!"
Look at the poor dog. He's not a dude and now he doesn't think he's a good boy, all because of this other dude. Was he sitting on the stool this whole time, waiting to make this dog feel bad? I guess you'll never know...
